amendment.description: To provide for cooperation between the United States and Israel on anti-tunnel capabilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2011 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2011 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Ayotte to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270; text: CR S4269-4270) To provide for cooperation between the United States and Israel on anti-tunnel capabilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2011 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2011 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Ayotte to Amendment SA 1463.
